name: Bright Hope (V)
Lore: 'Modified medium transport. Well armored. Has expanded passenger capacity to facilitate evacuation. The last transport to escape Hoth. Nearly destroyed by the Stalker.',
Text: 'May add 2 pilots and 6 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. During battle, if with a Rebel capital starship, may use 1 Force to cancel a just drawn battle destiny.',
